title: Following the Path of Six Gosvamis | Srila Prabhupada | ISKCON Bangalore
speaker: HDG Srila Prabhupada

segments.text: You cannot achieve the platform of devotional service by karma-kāṇḍa and jñāna-kāṇḍa processes.
Devotional service should not be contaminated by jñāna-kāṇḍa, karma-kāṇḍa,
by fruitive activities or mental speculation.
Devotional service should be taken exactly in the line of the great authorities.
We have to follow the principles of these six Gosvāmīs.
Otherwise, if we take devotional service as one of the pious activities, subha-kriya, that is offense,
we should not take devotional service of chanting of Hare Kṛṣṇa mantra
equal to some Vedic pious activities, ritualistic ceremony.
We should simply follow the path chalked out by the...
Devotional service is not dependent on subhā-subha-karmā.
It is simply dependent on the mercy of Kṛṣṇa and His devotees.
